name: tinkoff_fintech_frontend_3
description: Homeworks for frontend part of tinkoff fintech 3 school

scripts.test: echo $TRAVIS_BRANCH; if [ -z "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" ]; then export TRAVIS_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`; fi; export LESSON=`echo $TRAVIS_BRANCH | sed 's/[^0-9]//g'`; npm run unit-tests && npm run lint
